title.rendered: PART 1 of “Nuclear Weapons:  Updates on the Crisis and Opportunities”

content.rendered:
Nuclear weapons are a huge issue with several aspects that three knowledgeable guests explore in the DECEMBER 2019 TV program (PART 1) and the FEBRUARY 2020 TV program (PART 2) of the TV series, “Glen’s Parallax Perspectives.”  YOU CAN WATCH THE PROGRAMS ON YOUR COMPUTER even if you don’t have cable TV.

Cable TV subscribers in Thurston County WA can watch the highly informative interview three times a week (Mondays at 1:30 pm, Wednesdays at 5:00 pm, and Thursdays at 9:00 pm throughout the entire month of December 2019.  Part 2 of this interview will air on the same schedule throughout February 2020.

The danger of nuclear war has PERSISTED after the Cold War ended, and now the danger is ESCALATING AGAIN for several reasons that our guests discuss during this fascinating interview.

At the same time, the PEACE MOVEMENT HAS BEEN GROWING internationally and locally.  Our guests discuss those opportunities too.

If your knowledge of nuclear weapons peaked in the 1980s you will find much new information in both PART 1 and PART 2 of this interview.

To watch the December 2019 program (PART 1 of the 2-part series), CLICK THIS LINK.

The TV program’s producer and host, Glen Anderson, also typed up a very thorough summary of what we said.  The end of the very thorough summary includes many links to more information.

To read the very through summary of PART 1, CLICK THIS LINK: 2019.12 NUCLEAR WEAPONS — SUMMARY and RESOURCES

See much more information in this blog’s “Nuclear Weapons” category.

 

After I produced this TV program and posted it to my blog, my e-mail address changed from glenanderson@integra.net to glen@parallaxperspectives.org.  When you watch the TV video and/or read the linked document, please use my new e-mail address (and/or phone me at 360-491-9093) if you have any questions or want more information.
